record.field: Shipping & Delivery Policy Last updated February 17, 2023 This Shipping & Delivery Policy is part of our Terms and Conditions ("Terms") and should be therefore read alongside our main Terms: http://www.teameto.com/terms. Please carefully review our Shipping & Delivery Policy when purchasing our products. This policy will apply to any order you place with us. What are my shipping & delivery options? We offer various shipping options from third-party supplier where they will be responsible for delivery and handling of products. Shipping Options UPS DHL FedEx Canada Post Times, dates and chargers will be informed to the customer per order basis as made available to Everything Optical by the shipping service providers. We offer worldwide shipping. Please note, we may be subject to various rules and restrictions in relation to some international deliveries and you may be subject to additional taxes and duties over which we have no control. If such cases apply, you are responsible for complying with the laws applicable to the country where you live and will be responsible for any such additional costs or taxes. What happens if my order is delayed? If delivery is delayed for any reason we will let you know as soon as possible and will advise you of a revised estimated date for delivery. Value Through Delivery We are offered competitive shipping rates from service providers, and we pass these benefits to our clients to further add value to our services. How can you contact us about this policy? If you have any further questions or comments, you may contact us by: Email: support@teameto.com
